name: Chef John
bio: Chef John has been cooking for over 20 years and is known for his innovative twists on classic dishes.
bio_details: Chef John Doe is a renowned chef with over 20 years of experience in the culinary industry. He has worked in some of the finest restaurants around the world and has won numerous awards for his exceptional cuisine. Chef Doe specializes in French cuisine and is known for his innovative techniques and unique flavor combinations. He is also a published author and has written several cookbooks. In his spare time, Chef Doe enjoys hiking and spending time with his family.
cooking_method:
1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Add ground beef and pork and cook until browned, stirring occasionally, about 10 minutes.
3. Add crushed tomatoes and red wine, and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
4. Reduce heat to low and let simmer for 30-45 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Serve hot with the bolognese sauce.
